## PROJECT 1

**Stress Management in the Modern Workplace**

An **AI-powered microlearning module** designed to enhance employee wellbeing through scalable digital content.

### [Technical Profile]{style="color: #32fbe2;"}

-   **Tools Used:** [HeyGen]{style="color: #32fbe2; font-weight: bold;"} (AI Avatar & Voice Synthesis), [Adobe Creative Suite]{style="color: #32fbe2; font-weight: bold;"} (Visual Assets), and [ChatGPT]{style="color: #32fbe2; font-weight: bold;"} for instructional design.
-   **Key Objective:** To demonstrate how [AI-driven video production]{style="color: #32fbe2;"} can reduce development time while maintaining high engagement and a human-centric feel for global teams.
:::

## PROJECT 2

**World Happiness Rankings 2024 – Interactive Visualization**

I designed and developed an **interactive world map in Tableau** to visualize global happiness trends. The map uses a sophisticated color gradient where [dark blue]{style="color: #32fbe2; font-weight: bold;"} represents higher happiness scores, providing an immediate visual overview of global patterns.
:::

::: callout-note
This project is for **non-commercial, portfolio purposes only**. It demonstrates the ethical application of **AI-driven tools** and the visualization of **publicly available data** to showcase digital design and instructional capabilities.
:::

## [The Interactive Experience]{style="color: #32fbe2;"}

Users can explore **seven contributing factors**—including *Health, Social Support, and GDP per Capita*—through dynamic filters. Hovering over a country reveals exact scores, enabling an interactive, user-centered exploration of complex relationships.

::: {#tableauContainer .p-2 style="border: 1px solid #32fbe2; border-radius: 10px; background-color: rgba(50, 251, 226, 0.02); overflow: hidden; line-height: 0;"}
<iframe id="tableauViz" src="https://public.tableau.com/views/HappynessAroundtheWorldin2024/Dashboard1?:showVizHome=no&amp;:embed=true" style="width:100%; border:none; display: block;" allowfullscreen>

</iframe>

```{=html}
<script>
  function resizeTableau() {
    var container = document.getElementById('tableauContainer');
    var iframe = document.getElementById('tableauViz');
    if (container && iframe) {
      var width = container.offsetWidth;
      // Kicsit igazítunk az arányokon (0.6 a 16:9-hez közeli, de a Tableau fejlécet is számolva)
      var height = width * 0.65; 
      iframe.style.height = height + 'px';
    }
  }
  // Azonnali futtatás és eseményfigyelők
  window.addEventListener('resize', resizeTableau);
  window.onload = resizeTableau;
  // Egy kis késleltetés, hogy a Quarto biztosan betöltődjön
  setTimeout(resizeTableau, 500);
</script>
```
:::

## [UX Design Principles Applied]{style="color: #32fbe2;"}

::::: grid
::: g-col-6
### [Clear Information Hierarchy]{style="color: #b967ff;"}

Structured into clickable points, allowing users to explore step-by-step instead of being overwhelmed by text blocks.

### [User-Centered Navigation]{style="color: #b967ff;"}

Intuitive visual interactions that significantly reduce **cognitive load** and improve data digestion.

### [Global Scalability]{style="color: #b967ff;"}

A modular structure designed for easy localization and expansion across global learning platforms (**LMS / LxP**).
:::

::: g-col-6
### [Engagement & Retention]{style="color: #b967ff;"}

Interactive hotspots encourage active exploration, increasing attention and knowledge retention compared to static content.

### [Accessibility-Aware Design]{style="color: #b967ff;"}

Designed with clear labels, high contrast, and **keyboard navigation** to support inclusive learning experiences.

### [Strategic Alignment]{style="color: #b967ff;"}

The map connects **visual storytelling** with structured information delivery to meet specific communication goals.
:::
